name: LEGO: Crystal Catchers
description:
Title: LEGO: Crystal Catchers
Platform: PC Game
Genre: Platformer
Rating: E
Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers
Game Overview:
LEGO: Crystal Catchers is a brief platforming game. In it you'll face difficult enemies that you must evade. You'll encounter platforming you'll need to carefully traverse. And you'll find crystals that you must collect. Its made for all ages and thus can be played by anyone.
Instructions:
Use WASD controls for movement. Press spacebar to jump, and press it again to double jump. Turn the mouse to control the camera, and press TAB to pause the game.

Game Design Team
Christopher DePalma – Game Designer
